EmailTemplate.subject: ICYMI: New, Pay As You Go Jet ConneX Data Plan Available!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://standardaero.com/]]>
It Doesn't Get Any Better Than This!Â
For a limited time, Honeywell is offering business jet owners and operators the opportunity to enroll in a new Inmarsat Jet ConneX pay as you go service plan. With this new offering, you can get the best in-flight Wi-Fi available without worrying about paying for data you may not use. Take the guesswork out of selecting the right data plan and pay only for what you use with no restrictions.
What are you waiting for? Contact StandardAero today to schedule your JetWave upgrade and find out how you can take advantage of this limited time offer from Honeywell.
I WANT THE BEST IN-FLIGHT WI-FI! <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/StandardAero_JetWave_201901.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_stda_jw]]>
